casebody.data:
Richard J. FOSTER, Libelant-Appellant, v. Steamer ALFRED H. SMITH, Her Engines, etc., Claimant-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 5, 1928. No. 186. Maeklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Brown, Ely & Richards, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Lawrence E. Coffey, of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit- Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
